name: Jumper (Josh)
description:
Hello everyone!

This is a 2D platformer that I decided to put together for the Gameoff 2019. It is a simple game where the player must use his jumping and combat abilities to move swiftly through each level. Watch out for the baddies and step lightly.

NOTE: In the pause menu, if you click the return button to exit, your cross-hair will disappear. However, if you pause the game again and then press the ESC key to unpause the game, your cross hair will return.  Funny little bug!

Good luck and have fun!
